channel.title: [PI]Item Renaming Help! PLEASE READ[PI]
channel.description: Alright so i added tax bags, everything works. I just want to change the names. So i went in to both item.cfg's and changed the names, compiled, ran server, and the names were the same? I don't get it! I don't understand why it won't work..Some one please help..?

item.title: [PI]Item Renaming Help! PLEASE READ[PI]
item.dc:creator: @oxygen1 oxygen-_
item.description:
@oxygen1 wrote:

Sadly i’m retarded enough not to do that… X( I’m going to make it so i can change them all from the source instead of changing from the client. Already made the auto cache updater work lol

Read full topic

item.description:
@99def wrote:

did you change the name of the item in your client also?

item.title: [PI]Item Renaming Help! PLEASE READ[PI]
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

[quote=“omgomgomgl, post:2, topic:428702”]Well I hope you rep but here is how you do it go into your client find itemdef.java and add this.

case ####: // change this to the item id of the item you want to be called tax bags
itemDef.name = “####”; // change this to the the name you want the item to be.
itemDef.itemActions = new String[5];
itemDef.itemActions[1] = “Use”; // maybe need or maybe not remove it if you don’t want it.
itemDef.description = “put the description here this”; // replace with the description you want.[/quote]

This. If that doesn’t work post it again.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Item Renaming Help! PLEASE READ[PI]
item.dc:creator: @omgomgomgl omgomgomgl
item.description:
@omgomgomgl wrote:

Well I hope you rep but here is how you do it go into your client find itemdef.java and add this.

case ####: // change this to the item id of the item you want to be called tax bags
itemDef.name = “####”; // change this to the the name you want the item to be.
itemDef.itemActions = new String[5];
itemDef.itemActions[1] = “Use”; // maybe need or maybe not remove it if you don’t want it.
itemDef.description = “put the description here”; // replace with the description you want.

Read full topic
